mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CST_DC_ANSWER_HISTORY_MAP_LMS ( GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, FORM_ID, FORM_NAME, ANSWER_ID, CUST_ID, MAIL_ADDR1, CP_DATE, CP_NAME_L, CP_NAME_F, CP_KANA_L, CP_KANA_F, CP_SEX, CP_BIRTHDAY, CP_KEN_ID, CP_KEN, CP_ADDR2, CP_ADDR3, CP_ZIP_CODE, CP_TEL, CP_TEL2, CP_CAR_FLG, CP_MAKER_CD, CP_MAKER_NM, CP_CAR_CD, CP_CAR_NM, CP_SYONENDO, CP_SYONENDO_Y, CP_SYONENDO_M, OPTIN_FLG21, HTML_FLG21, OPTIN_FLG1, HTML_FLG1 ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{formId}, #{formName}, #{answerId}, #{custId}, #{mailAddr1}, #{cpDate}, #{cpNameL}, #{cpNameF}, #{cpKanaL}, #{cpKanaF}, #{cpSex}, #{cpBirthday}, #{cpKenId}, #{cpKen}, #{cpAddr2}, #{cpAddr3}, #{cpZipCode}, #{cpTel}, #{cpTel2}, #{cpCarFlg}, #{cpMakerCd}, #{cpMakerNm}, #{cpCarCd}, #{cpCarNm}, #{cpSyonendo}, #{cpSyonendoY}, #{cpSyonendoM}, #{optinFlg21}, #{htmlFlg21}, #{optinFlg1}, #{htmlFlg1} )
